title: Hydrodeoxygenation of bio-oil model compounds over Ni- and Pt-catalysts supported on hydrophobized halloysite nanotubes
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00518J, Paper
Gleb Zasypalov, Vladimir Klimovsky, Egor Abramov, Anna Vutolkina, Ekaterina Mustakimova, Sergey P. Verevkin, Valentin Stytsenko, Aleksandr Glotov
The development of active and stable catalysts for liquid-phase hydrodeoxygenation (HDO) of bio-oil derived from lignocellulose is challenging. We have proposed the strategy for the design of Ni- and Pt-...
